text: Albania-Greece relations over the last hundred years, which coincide with the modern history of the Albanian state, have been dominated by two fundamental issues: territorial/border disputes and the issue of minorities, phenomena typical of two nations and neighboring states.Rrokada e rradhës e ambasadorëve shqiptarë në GreqiDiplomatët Shqiptarë që nga fillet e diplomacisë shqiptare e deri sot.
